page.title: 17TRAFFIC SURVEY IN HAMPTON
page.content: We did a traffic survey on the corner of the Uxbridge Road by Hampton Hill and Bushy Park. We counted the traffic for 15 mins.in three catagories. Local traffic included cars vans and motorbikes. Public transport included buses coaches and taxis.Then we counted heavy lorries.The amount of local traffic in both directions in 1 hour was 900 vehicles. Public transport was 36 per hour. Heavy lorries was 48 per hour. The reason the Uxbridge Road was so busy is because it was rush hour and the road links up two airports (Heathrow and Gatwick) and two motorways (M3 and M4). At the moment a new motorway is being built , this is the M25. This will hopefully cut down the amount of traffic along the road and the noise. WALDEGRAVE SCHOOL
